advisorChartDescription.defaultMessage: This chart shows recommendations effecting your system

complianceEmptyStateBody.defaultMessage: The compliance service uses OpenSCAP policies to track your organization's adherence to compliance requirements

dataPrivacyAndControls.defaultMessage: Red Hat Insights provides a mechanism for users to obtain actionable intelligence regarding suggested improvements to deployed Red Hat software. This document covers the security measures Red Hat puts in place to provide secure transmission, processing, and analysis of this data by those tools.

dataPrivacyAndControlsTitle.defaultMessage: Data privacy and controls in Red Hat Insights

deniedStateBody.defaultMessage: Contact your organization administrator(s) for more information

deniedStateTitle.defaultMessage: You do not have access to {appName}

errorStateTitle.defaultMessage: {appName} has experienced an error. Contact Red Hat support if the problem persists.

learnmoreRHI.defaultMessage: Learn more about Red Hat Insights
learnmoreRHI.description: Learn more about Red Hat Insights

noSystemsDescription.defaultMessage: With predictive analytics, avoid problems and unplanned downtime in your Red Hat environment. Red Hat Insights is included with your Red Hat Enterprise Linux subscription.

noSystemsInstall.defaultMessage: Install the client on the RHEL system

noSystemsRegister.defaultMessage: Register the system to Red Hat Insights

noSystemsTitle.defaultMessage: Get started with Red Hat Insights

providesAdditionalSAPworkload.defaultMessage: Red Hat Insights provides additional SAP workload-focused enhancements to provide a curated view of the health across the SAP Landscape on Red Hat Enterprise Linux. This functionality further enables Insights detection and remediation capabilities for workload optimization, performance, stability, compliance & security. <break></break> Red Hat Insights has not detected any hosts running a SAP workload. To take advantage of these features, please install the Insights-client on an RHEL host running SAP & these systems will be automatically profiled.
providesAdditionalSAPworkload.description: Red Hat Insights provides additional SAP

recsImpactingSystems.defaultMessage: {totalRecs, plural, one {# Recommendation} other {# Recommendations}} impacting {systems, plural, one {# system} other {# systems}}

remediationsNoDataBody.defaultMessage: Create an Ansible Playbook to remediate or mitigate vulnerabilities or configuration issues.
remediationsNoDataBody.description: Create a playbook to see remediations

remediationsNoDataTitle.defaultMessage: You haven't created any remediation Playbooks yet

rhm1.defaultMessage: Red Hat Management gives you the flexibility to manage Red Hat Enterprise Linux on-premise or in a hosted environment

rhm2.defaultMessage: Red Hat Management covers your entire system and security management life cycle

rhm3.defaultMessage: Red Hat Management includes Red Hat Satellite and the new cloud management services for Red Hat Enterprise Linux

singleConsistent.defaultMessage: Single, consistent management solution across on-premise, hybrid cloud, and public cloud. Included with Red Hat Enterprise Linux subscription.

smartManagement.defaultMessage: Smart Management subscription enables push-button remediation of issues identified by Insights. Any issues identified by Insights are accompanied by remediation instructions, and with Smart Management, remediation is available at scale.

totalRiskDef.defaultMessage: A value derived from the likelihood that the condition will negatively affect your infrastructure, and the impact on system operation if that were to happen

zslblBody.defaultMessage: Deliver more reliable IT solutions by identifying performance and configuration risks before downtime occurs. With less downtime, IT can focus on higher value projects and deepen their skills.

zslblTitle.description: zero state left bullet list title

zslblb1.defaultMessage: Meet high IT performance and security demands across traditional and cloud instances.
zslblb1.description: zero state left bullet list b1

zslblb2.defaultMessage: Gain operational confidence through enhanced visibility into IT environments.
zslblb2.description: zero state left bullet list b2

zslblb3.defaultMessage: Optimize staff efficiency and extend Linux skills.
zslblb3.description: zero state left bullet list b3

zslblb4.defaultMessage: Shift teams to focus on delivering innovation.
zslblb4.description: zero state left bullet list b4

zslblb5.defaultMessage: Control complexity by working with fewer and more reliable configurations.
zslblb5.description: zero state left bullet list b5

zsrblBody.defaultMessage: Identify risks in advance, and filter to focus on the most important ones. Continually analyze against a large volume of Red Hat industry vulnerability and compliance advisories, as well as your own policies without manual steps.

zsrblTitle.description: zero state right bullet list title

zsrblb1.defaultMessage: Implement more defined analytics-driven processes for risk assessment and prioritization.
zsrblb1.description: zero state right bullet list b1

zsrblb2.defaultMessage: Remediate prioritized risks using easy to understand guidance or Ansible ™ Playbooks to address threats at scale.
zsrblb2.description: zero state right bullet list b2

zsrblb3.defaultMessage: Gain visibility into your posture regarding security vulnerabilities, industry compliance, and internally defined security policies.
zsrblb3.description: zero state right bullet list b3

zsrblb4.description: zero state right bullet list b4

zsrblb5.defaultMessage: Implement predictable processes. Shift teams to more predictable processes for continuous security visibility.
zsrblb5.description: zero state right bullet list b5

zssampleActionButton.defaultMessage: Register systems to find issues across your infrastructure
zssampleActionButton.description: zero state sample call to action button

zssampleTitleL.defaultMessage: Latest security vulnerabilities affecting RHEL infrastructures
